choices.answer: Thebes is being invaded by rebel forces
Thebes is being tortured by a Sphinx

Thebes is desperate for a new king after Laius' death

choices.answer: The killer of the Sphinx must be brought to justice
The killer of Laius must be brought to justice
The children of Oedipus and Jocasta must be banished from the city
The city must be be burned to the ground

How does Teiresias first react when he arrives?

choices.answer: Confused due to his old age

choices.answer: Oedipus is the murderer of his King Laius

Oedipus is in an incestuous relationship with his mother
